ServiceExceptionReport.ServiceException: msSLDApplySLDURL: WMS server error. Could not open SLD file:///etc/passwd and save it in a temporary file. Please make sure that the sld url is valid and that the temporary path is set. The temporary path can be defined for example by setting TEMPPATH in the map file. Please check the MapServer documentation on temporary path settings. msHTTPExecuteRequests(): HTTP request error. HTTP: request failed with curl error code 1 (Protocol "file" not supported or disabled in libcurl) for file:///etc/passwd
